publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3855 Stewart Stevenson: Scottish Fishing Services -That the Parliament welcomes the formation of an industry association to represent the many service companies dependent upon fishing; congratulates the founders on obtaining support from all parts of Scotland, from Berwick to the northern isles and from the west coast, and calls on the Scottish Executive to respond to their concerns in these very difficult times. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, Richard Lochhead*, Tavish Scott*, Christine Grahame*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-3855 Scottish Fishing Services (lodged on 4 February 2003) Brian Adam*, Irene McGugan*, Alasdair Morgan*, Fergus Ewing*, Kay Ullrich*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S1M-3855 Scottish Fishing Services (lodged on 4 February 2003) Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Ms Sandra White*

S1M-3855 Stewart Stevenson: Scottish Fishing Services —That the Parliament welcomes the formation of an industry association to represent the many service companies dependent upon fishing; congratulates the founders on obtaining support from all parts of Scotland, from Berwick to the northern isles and from the west coast, and calls on the Scottish Executive to respond to their concerns in these very difficult times.Supported by: Alex Johnstone, Richard Lochhead, Tavish Scott, Christine Grahame, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Brian Adam, Irene McGugan, Alasdair Morgan, Fergus Ewing, Kay Ullrich, Mr Andrew Welsh, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Ms Sandra White
S1M-3855 Scottish Fishing Services (lodged on 4 February 2003) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3855 Scottish Fishing Services (lodged on 4 February 2003) Alex Neil*
S1M-3855 Scottish Fishing Services (lodged on 4 February 2003) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-3855 Scottish Fishing Services (lodged on 4 February 2003) Mr Gil Paterson*, Shona Robison*
S1M-3855 Scottish Fishing Services (lodged on 4 February 2003) Andrew Wilson*

S1M-3855 Stewart Stevenson: Scottish Fishing Services —That the Parliament welcomes the formation of an industry association to represent the many service companies dependent upon fishing; congratulates the founders on obtaining support from all parts of Scotland, from Berwick to the northern isles and from the west coast, and calls on the Scottish Executive to respond to their concerns in these very difficult times. Supported by: Alex Johnstone, Richard Lochhead, Tavish Scott, Christine Grahame, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Brian Adam, Irene McGugan, Alasdair Morgan, Fergus Ewing, Kay Ullrich, Mr Andrew Welsh, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Ms Sandra White, Donald Gorrie, Alex Neil, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Gil Paterson, Shona Robison, Andrew Wilson
